body: Dropping files directly into `$HOME` is annoying. It would be better to use `$HOME/.config/spack/` and `$HOME/.local/share/spack/` to store files for spack. See the [XDG spec](https://specifications.freedesktop.org/basedir-spec/basedir-spec-latest.html) for more. Of course, OS X and Windows will probably want something different anyways.
title: Move ~/.spack
